[LOG]
loglevel = 4

[URL]
dsa_base_url = http://www.debian.org/security/
pkg_base_url = https://freeside.trust.cased.de/apt-sec/mirror

[DIR]
cache_dir = cache/
dists_dir = mirror/dists/
arch = amd64

[DSA]
first_dsa = 11
first_usn = 1
first_fsa = 1
blacklist = DSA-1975, DSA-2360, DSA-2134, DSA-3043, DSA-3156, DSA-4342


[TRUST]
lambda = 36
